content.en: Optimization algorithms: Researchers are exploring ways to improve the effectiveness and performance of surrogate-assisted evolutionary algorithms for various types of optimization problems. They are developing adaptive algorithms that can handle high-dimensional, expensive, irregular, and constrained multi-objective optimization problems. These algorithms use techniques such as adaptive surrogates, data-driven approaches, and model management to enhance the efficiency and reliability of the optimization process.
content.da: Optimeringsalgoritmer: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af surrogat-assisterede evolutionære algoritmer til forskellige typer optimeringsproblemer. De udvikler adaptive algoritmer, der kan håndtere højdimensionelle, dyre, uregelmæssige og begrænsede multiobjektive optimeringsproblemer. Disse algoritmer bruger teknikker som adaptive surrogater, datadrevne tilgange og modelhåndtering for at øge effektiviteten og pålideligheden af optimeringsprocessen.
